content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard in orange, ca, on the evening of june 17, 2015, when i began to notice a grouping of seven unusual lights to the north. they were already fairly high in the sky when first noticed so i cannot say definitely that they ascended from the ground or descended to the ground. my first thought was that some idiots had let off some japanese lanterns and i thought that was really stupid in this weather. but then i noticed that they seemed to move on their own volition and appeared to move around each other too. i also had the feeling they were farther away than what i had thought: but they were as bright as the aircraft coming into john wayne airport. all of the points of light were the same brightness. i decided then to go get my phone and take a picture; when i came back, though, they were not in the sky. but within a minute or two they were back, only 5 this time, and seemed to appear out of nowhere. they hovered and a few played tag with each other, then a couple were gone and only 3 remained, hovering stationary for a few moments, then they were just gone. i did not see them zoom off or leave, they just weren't there.
content.summary: Unusual light formations noticed over orange county, ca

content.detailedDescription: I stepped out on the back porch one night. i believe it was in the late 90s, i was about 7-9 years old. i don't think it was cold outside, so probably around the summer. i saw a glowing green object above the treeline. it was what i would consider a classic shape- like a disc with a round top. it moved in a really strange way, like it would slide to the left and pause for maybe a second, then continue to slide and pause. i'm not sure how long i watched it or how i lost sight of it. i think my family was all asleep. i remember going into my grandma's room to go to bed and watched out the window, but i don't remember if i could still see it or not. i've never told anyone, i didn't think anyone would believe me.
content.summary: Glowing green object in sky

content.detailedDescription: While exiting the mall i was actuall living in, i went out back for a smoke and when i looked to my right i observed 3 strange lights pulsating from red to green. i noticed they were in triangle formation and hovering a field next to an airforce base which was our neighbor. i felt like it was emmiting some kind of energy but was silent..I had to rub my eyes several times to make sure i was actuall seeing this..After just watching in amazement for approx 10 min. i walked over to the rear door of a pizza place next door to my shop in the mall as it was the only business opened in the mall at the time. i knocked several times. when someone opened the door i turned to look at while i was telling them about and sure enough it was gone..
content.summary: Standing outside the rear of a strip mall located on holyoke- westfield ma., i observed this object for 10 min..Air show at barnes afb was to happen the next day

content.detailedDescription: Driving on 33rd street in edmond ok.Headind east bound ao 10pm.We were between boulevard and coltrane.We noticed 5 fireballs to the north heading towards us.They were flying in a straight line.We went to get a better view to take pictures and video them.Drove onto coltrane heading north towards 15th steet and pulled over.The 5 fireballs from the north heading south turned and headed ne.Then 3 more fireballs came fron the sw and joined the other 5 fireballs and very quickly disappeared.
content.summary: Fireballs flying through the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was about to go to sleep when i looked out to see ufo sightings and several of them i watched as they shot some kind of beam at the planes going by. they even shot beams at my neighbours house and the chimney wobbled i thought i was seeing things but it happened again. i tried to get pictures but i have a crappy phone 📱 couldn't get very good pictures i also took video and when i tried to enhance the picture i took it was then i saw the clear picture of them in my neighbours room.  they have been coming every day since the 3rd of june but it is done to just two of them.  that's all i can see from my windows.
content.summary: Cigar shaped and round orbs moving fast around

content.detailedDescription:
I am a retired truck driver. i retired back in 2004. i drove truck for a food chain out of st. louis mo. i am not certain about the year that this happen. i wish that i had more information on the year. the best way i can explain this too you is that i was heading up to evansville indiana. i was traveling on highway 64 and because of the time that has gone by, i am not totally sure of the location. however as i travel up highway 64 there was a rest stop two miles ahead of me as i got close to the rest stop it was just getting dark. as i traveled toward the rest stop there was a cornfield to my right and the corn had been cut down as i proceeded highway 64 i notice a high polished silver object sitting on the ground and what i could make out was what look like four windows with lights on the inside. as i went pass i question what i saw because i have worked on farms but i never seen a farm implement like that before. because of it being a high polished steel and what look like to be four windows i did not realize exactly what i was looking at that time. i thought maybe there was some kind of new farm equipment but as i thought about it more i couldn't figure anything on a farm to be like that. i discover what i was looking at when i seen that tv show of ufo over illinois because when i was seen what was describe by those who told what they saw it is the very same that i saw sitting on the ground. 



 p.S. i am sorry that it took me so long to notify you.
content.summary: I am sure that what i saw what a ufo after i saw the tv show of ufo over illinois

content.detailedDescription: On june 18, 2015 @ 12:15 a.M., in lacey, wa.  i was watching ancient aliens on the history 2 channel, in my bedroom on the second floor.  i had my window open. and i could already hear a military helicopter, (blackhawk) flying east of my house. it's normal for military helicopters to fly over and around us, because the military base jblm is just northeast of us on the i-5.  every day for the past couple of weeks jblm has been firing artillery rounds at their range, and they always have helicopters flying around.  the local news said jblm would be firing artillery rounds for a month, however, tonight their wasn't any artillery.  i went to my window to look for the helicopter.  the helicopter was southeast and approximately 500 ft. above the trees, from my bedroom.  i noticed the helicopter was flying northeast towards mt. rainier, and that is when i saw a red-orange orb hovering above the trees north of mt. rainier. the orb glowed for a minute then it disappeared for 15 seconds, then reappeared just north of its last position and did that for 5 minutes.  meanwhile the military helicopter was approaching the orb while the orb was disappearing and reappearing.  the orb was glowing as bright as the helicopter's lights, but didn't have the strobe light like the helicopter.  when the helicopter got really close to the orb, the orb disappeared for good.  during this whole event you could hear the helicopter fading away towards the orb, and at this time you could hear a jet in the distance and west of my position.  the orb, however, never made a sound.
content.summary: Viewed a red-orange orb north of mt. rainier, just above the trees.

content.detailedDescription:
I will attempt to be as detailed as possible. please bear with me.

approximately 10:30pm mst wednesday june 17, 2015 - 

i was speaking on the phone and sweeping a few leaves off of the back patio of my house when i heard a hovering/stationary helicopter not far in the distance. i looked up and observed a clear view of a typical commercial or civilian-type helicopter hovering over the adjacent residential and commercial area no higher than approximately 500-1000 feet from the ground, northwest of my vantage point no more than 1/4 mile away. despite the darkness of the evening sky, the helicopter looked very similar in shape to a hospital life flight or news station-type helicopter; but because of the darkness i was unable to see any markings or letters on the helicopter as to identify the helicopter. it did not appear to be a military helicopter nor did it have that louder, deeper, choppy or rumble-type sound that military helicopters typically have. the helicopter had the typical green, red and white lights on it (similar to the life flight helicopter that operates out of the ihc hospital here in st. george 1-2 miles north of the location this helicopter was hovering). these common lights were distinctly visible and the helicopter did not project any other lights such as a beam or search/spot light. 

presuming the helicopter was life flight, i watched the helicopter hover for approximately 30-60 seconds wondering why it was just hovering and was  not attempting to maneuver horizontally as if to fly away northbound toward the hospital or vertically as if it were going to ascend or descend in order to assist a person in need. as i continued to watch the stationary helicopter, i noticed a bright white opaque sphere/orb of light at approximately the same altitude as the hovering helicopter, 300-500 feet due east of the helicopter, also hovering in a stationary manner. (my initial instinct was that the helicopter was stationary because it too was observing/witnessing the sphere/orb and was not in the vicinity for medical assistance purposes.)

the easiest way to describe the size of the sphere from my vantage point would be to say that if i had a golf ball in my hand and i held the golf ball with a fully-extended arm out from my body 45 degrees from the horizon (i'm 5'6'), the golf ball and the sphere/orb i was witnessing would appear to be approximately the same size. 

within approximately 10 seconds of first noticing the sphere/orb of bright, opaque, white light, the sphere/orb slowly began to move horizontally, maintaing its same altitude, as it proceeded eastward. i observed the sphere/orb for approximately 5-10 more seconds as it proceeded eastward (away from the city of st george toward the vast dark undeveloped terrain east of st george toward the us forest service and national parks areas) having traveled an approximated 1/4 mile during that brief time period at a consistent altitude. the sphere/orb did not appear to be ascending whatsoever during this time period before i observed it begin to disappear from sight. this is where my sighting became most intriguing and defies all logic.

the sphere/orb did not fade from sight because it ascended to a high enough altitude (again, it did not appear to be ascending) or because it moved horizontally a sufficient distance as to fade into the horizon. 

rather, the shpere/orb appeared to reduce itself in size..... i observed what appeared to be as if the sphere/orb was making an actual physical transformation. i observed a distinct change in physical manifestation and appearance of the sphere/orb. 

lacking a background in physics or material sciences (or any sciences for that matter), i cannot adequately describe or use actual valid scientific terms to describe what i witnessed. the best i can do is to say that the sphere/orb appeared as if it was morphing (i witnessed what appeared to be actual physical changes taking place) or that the sphere/orb was entering into a different dimension if that makes sense. bottom line, it was as if it disappeared into itself. it disappeared on the spot as opposed to disappearing at a distance.

shocked from what i had just witnessed, i looked back to see if the helicopter was still in the location where i had initially observed it. it was; the helicopter continued to hover it the exact spot where i had first noticed it. again i presumed the helicopter had maintained its stationary course as if it were also observing or monitoring the sphere/orb. the helicopter continued to hover for an additional 60 seconds or more once the sphere/orb was no longer visible. 

the helicopter then turned and proceeded to slowly move west-southwest (away from the direction the sphere/orb had moved) and gradually ascended to an altitude more customary of a life flight-type helicopter as it continued to  move in a southwesterly direction away from st george proper. i watched the helicopter continue slowly on that southwesterly path for about 1-2 minutes before i observed it turn back northward, appear to slightly descend, and then continue on a north-northeasterly path back  across the city (as if it were heading toward the washington or hurricane areas, far north of the ihc hospital in st george where i had presumed the helicopter had originated) until my view of the helicopter was obstructed by the bluffs north of my home, east of the i-15. 

i cannot tell you what it was i saw. and i certainly will never be able to understand - let alone explain - the manner in which the sphere/orb disappeared from my sight. but i fully believe that the helicopter i described herein witnessed the same thing i witnessed. 

if you can find out the source/ownership of the helicopter, perhaps they too could give you a description of these events. other than an occasional lone military helicopter in the distance, i have never seen any common or commercial-type helicopter in the area other than the ihc hospital life flight helicopter. i'm not sure whether there are additional commercial or private helicopters that operate out of the st george airport (several miles east-southeast of my location) but i presume there are many, especially those who may transport tourists for aerial views of the nearby zions national park (many miles north-northeast of my location). perhaps they may be of resource for you in attempting to find the identity of the helicopter that i fully believe also witnessed this amazing event were you interested in contacting them as well.
content.summary: Hovering bright white orb under 500 feet altitude being observed by stationary helicopter; proceeded slowly eastward at same altitude until it reduced itself in size and disappeared as if into different dimension

content.detailedDescription: As a kid, in about 2nd or 3rd grade, i was staying over at a friend's house one night, watching the movie twister. we were in his bedroom with our backs to the window when i suddenly had the urge to turn and look out the window. it was then that i stared in awe at what was predominately a saucer shaped silver/grey object with red and blue lights around it that blinked in a pattern. it was about 50 feet in the air and maybe 50 feet away and descending in a hovering fashion very slowly. as it descended, three stilt-like landing prongs came from a domed part of the craft on the bottom. it also had a triangular shape with the top cut off type of structure on top of the craft where two antennas were positioned. as i stared for maybe ten seconds, my friend noticed me and asked what i was looking at. i motioned to him to turn and look out the window and he then stared with me for maybe 30-45 seconds in astonishment as the craft slowly descended, disappearing through the trees, and landed in a wooded area that railroad tracks ran through right behind his backyard. at that we both jumped up in fear and he ran to get his dad, who then came in to the room and looked out the window to of course see nothing, and informed us that it was just our imaginations and to go to sleep. he then returned to his room to go back to sleep and left us to uncomfortably go between trying to force our eyes closed and peeking out the window. we never saw anything else of the object and eventually fell asleep. for the next few years before i moved to another school, that friend and i would frequently talk about what we saw that night. i would even have dreams that i had gone out to the backyard and was confronted by "grey" beings who i communicated with telepathically and told them about myself. seeing this unidentified flying object was something incredible that i am lucky to have witnessed and will never forget.
content.summary: Friend and i observed ufo hovering and landing from about 50 feet in air and 50 feet away from us.

content.detailedDescription: So one night i was smoking weed at a friends' apartment. he left and not long after the police came by, i refused to let them in and they kicked the door open. i fought off 12 police officers and they illegally all tased me at once and killed me. this caused some kind of field to consume my mind, i then was spoken to, and limitless visions flooded my mind, spacecraft, events unfolding, areas unrecognizable, strange faces, explosions of ancient ruins, and last of all a stone face of an annunaki blowing up in a trail of dust. i never got a name but the voice spoke slow and plain. the voice told me that few are chosen by any of their kind, and that they will visit again. in images i think i saw present, past, and future events. i say this because i saw myself talking with people i have only just met, and one image of me talking to giorgio a. tsoukalos. i have never met this man and had no clue who he was, i have just recently seen him on his new show and have discovered the work he does. i need help from someone to make me believe that i am not going crazy. i woke up in a hospital on life support for two days and also on a breathing machine with all charges dropped. so whatever spoke to me also helped me keep a clean criminal record... i hope you guys can help me because i am losing my mind! i wish i could be more use, but i would like a follow up interview in person, so i can draw the things i saw
content.summary: Electricity caused phenomenon

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1am. i was at a friend's house and we decided to go outside for a while to relax and talk on her porch. a few of our other friend's decided to go out for a night swim in the pool. while we were talking, my friend noticed something rising from the mountain range, behind an elementary school that is directly behind her house. we all watched this bright, asprin-sized white/gold object rise and then stop. it stayed there for a while, and it looked like it dropped something a couple times. it got dimmer and then descended back down like a leaf floating slowly back in forth. my friend described it as looking like someone parachuting down. about 20 minutes later, my friend and i were talking about what we had just saw, but then heard our friend's drying off say to shut up. my friend had then asked why and the reply was that they saw someone walking through the field behind their backyard, near the school. as soon as i had heard that, i looked up and saw a strange, dark-looking figure walking very fast. it was almost as if they were gliding. at the time we thought it was just a random tweaker, but quickly noticed this figure was super tall and naked. probably about 7ft tall. those who were closer were whistling to get its attention, but it continued to walk with, as one described "it's very skinny arm wrapped around it's chest as if it was injured". she then called out to it, saying "hey, what are you doing?" as soon as she finished talking, the figure slowly turned our way, staring at all of us. my friend who had spoken out was the closest to the "thing" and yelled that it was not human, it had no face, and that it had no hair. two of the three girls drying off in the yard ran up to my friend and i on the porch, and we all had a good stare down with the figure for about 5 seconds, until i said we should head inside. the figure was not saying anything, but just creepily staring, and it had made me feel not only scared, but uncomfortable. as each of us ran inside, we slammed the sliding glass door shut, and then realized one of the three girls in the yard was still out there, so we opened the door once again, letting her in. before she came inside, she took one look back, and said she could still see it staring us down. we got her in, locked the door, shut and locked all windows in the house because we were afraid of it coming to the house, since it had just watched where we went. we went back to the door and opened it. the figure was gone. we then called the authorities, saying that we had saw someone naked walking in the elementary's field, behind her house. they did send someone out, but it took a good 10 to 15 minutes before they came. they did patrol the school, looking out into the field with their spotlight, but not for long. they had then left. we all went back outside on the portch, hoping to see it walk back so that we could see where it went and what exactly it was doing. we also wanted to see it again. we waited a good 20 minutes, but it did not come back, so we went back inside. one thing we all regret about that night was running inside so quickly because we did not get a picture or see where it had went. now we all worry it will return back to her house. especially since it knows now where they live.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A bright asprin-sized object rose from the mountain range, and then hovered for a while. it then fell like a leaf back behind the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom, just getting ready to go to sleep. i always used to look out the window at night, i used to like watching the snow fall in the street light. one night, i remember i got a strange feeling, and i looked out the window and saw lights.. i went right up to the window and i looked closer, and i saw a huge ship with blinking lights. they were all different colors, and i could make out a door on the bottom. the shape seemed to be round, but i was looking at it from the side so i'm not 100 percent sure. i was so shocked after realizing it was real that i ran to get my mom, i had to talk her into coming to look, it took a minute and by the time we went back in it was gone.. i was so upset. a while later after my mom talking to me and calming me down i went to bed and i was visited. i'll never forget it. i was about 6 years old, i am 24 now and i can still feel the emotions.. they came into my bedroom and the voices is what woke me up. it must have been about an hour or two after i went to bed. my mom was sleeping on the couch... i looked around from my bed and i saw two of them, with a couple more shadows in the doorway, there was a mist and some light, i remember i couldn't talk or move.. i could just listen. they said something to me but i don't remember what it was.. they were just standing there talking, looking at me for what seemed like forever, and then they turned and walked away. i felt kind of helpless for a while, they seemed to have so much control. i was scared, upset.. ever since then i've felt more sensitive to them, i've had  lot of sightings, usually just from far away. objects that sit there, and then shoot away. sometimes they even look like stars at first, but then move back and forth. my mom has seen them with me since then, we had a red orb come down almost on top of our car and we had vibrations and a loud humming noise and it scared both of us. that was driving through bucksport around 2006-07.
content.summary: Object seen outside, visitation, lifelong memory..

content.detailedDescription: I saw a bright light,watched for a second. it started moving,fast. i kept my eye on it and got out my phone. i have video!!!
content.summary: Bright light,moving way too fast,doing stuff planes dont do

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my bedroom to get something and i opened the bedroom door and the lights where off but the light from the hallway  the door was enough to see everything in my room but as i opened the door i looked in and seen the figure it turned around and looked at me, i feel to the floor and started shaking pretty bad as soon as i stopped and i got up and it was gone
content.summary: I walked in my bedroom and seen the alien looking down at my bed

content.detailedDescription: While out in my driveway lifting weights. doing bench presses, i looked up and observed a cylinder shaped object hovering over my garage. it was silver shaped like a can of soup.  it was maybe five feet long and four feed around.  it hovered , with no sound and finally took off strait up in the sky.
content.summary: When in my driveway lifting weights lying on my back i observed a cylinder shaped object hovering over me.

content.detailedDescription: I saw 3 military helicopters appeared to be escorting a large dark, silent, object above them...Seen in stoughton wisconsin..At appox.. 9:15 pm
content.summary: i saw 3 military helicopters seemed to be escorting dark object above them...Something made me feel i should look

content.detailedDescription: I was a u.S. soldier, with the 4th of the 6th infantry , stationed in berlin. we went on an irf ( immediate reaction force ) maneuver in italy near venice.  this was in 1976.  we were sent to secure a piece of a mountain near venice and vicenza ,  standing on guard looking down over the mountain hovering over the city of vicenza i saw a huge cigar shaped object it looked like what i call a taquila sunrise color. red, orange and yellow.  it glowed with little sound and hovered.  i had a friend with me we both saw this and by the time we looked back we had lost four hours.  we were at a loss to explain where we were and nearly were prosecuted for leaving our post.  we tried to explain to our sergeant of the guard what happened and were told to shut up.  i have never spoken about this since.  my buddy and i never spoke of any of this to each other or anyone else.
content.summary: Was on guard duty on top of mountain in italy.  saw object hovering over city looked back down and had lost four hours.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning to fort benning georgia on hwy 280, from visiting my grandmother in cordele georgia.  i was a major in army medical corp.  we had our one year old in the car. 
we were the only car on the road then at 11pm or so.  we saw an orange orb or ball of light coming over the trees from the right of the road.  we were both alarmed immediately and yelled out.  i slammed on brakes to avoid going right under it.  it appeared to be 100 feet ahead and about 30 feet in diameter with the bottom of it about 40 feet over the road.  i backed up some.  we were scared.  the orange orb appeared glowing and uniform without sound or other features.  it appeared to be moving steadily at about 1 mph and we observed it for about 2 minutes before it disappeared over a line of trees about 100 feet from the road to the southwest.  it always appeared to be about 40 feet over the road.
when it was gone from sight we sped out of there towards columbus, thoroughly shaken up, discussing what we had seen.  we had no explanations, just fear and thankful that we were safe. we checked the news but it was not in the papers, and perhaps no one else had seen it.
content.summary: It crossed the road scaring us

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were riding the motorcycle and put it up. she went to eat and i went to talk to her grandpa. somethin was telling me to look up. i tried to get him to come outside but he went to bed.So i went to go up and get my wife and i looked at jupiter and 2 stars above it .
i told my wife to come down. well she came down and the 2 stars that were above jupiter 
were below it now. i said damn it we missed it. she said missed what? i said watch jupiter.  
i started to look around and she said look. the stars are moving! then one shot out of another and made a triangular formation. then one came out of another and made a rectangular formation.  then they all spoke to me and said "the rapture is soon . come with us."then the brightest one that i thought was jupiter fell from the sky and started talkin to me. i have learned more things in that 2to5 minutes than my entire life. it went back to in front of jupiter. another orange fireball came from polaris and went inside one of those stars. they moved for about 3hrs.
content.summary: Stars moving and one star fell and talked to me. got over me, huge in size. orange fireball

content.detailedDescription:
This report has been filled out by f.I. l.F. who volunteers at mufon hq, while talking to the witness on the phone 6/17/15  at 5:30 pm pst
------------------------------------------------------------------------

when i was 10 or 11 years old i saw a saucer in the wheat field near a cabin we were staying in. it was in the summer of 1955 to 1957. i was 10 or 11 years old. in the evening i was going outside and saw a glowing, white, saucer in the wheat field. it was about 50 feet in diameter. i used the outhouse and when i came out it was still there.I got to 20 feet of it and saw steps/ramp coming out of it. i ran inside to tell the adults, but they were playing cards and drinking and wouldn't come outside. i finally gave up and went to bed.
the next day i got my father to go out to the wheat field to see where the saucer had been. we found a perfect circle of bent and broken wheat where i had seen the saucer. the wheat was not burned and we found no footprints except ours. my father said it was deer laying in the field, but i had seen the saucer.  
this farm is 20 miles north of cranberry township off rte 19 and graham road. as far as i know the land was not barren after that.
i suffered no missing time, or any illness from being so close to the saucer.
i am retired law enforcement and have seen a number of odd sighting in my career, which i did not report.
content.summary: When i was 10 or 11 years old i saw a saucer in the wheat field near a cabin we were staying in

content.detailedDescription:
On june 15, 2015 between 11:30 and 11:45 a star like object moved east as if it were floating
i thought it was a satellite but when it got over my house it curled upward in a backwards horseshoe pattern and went straight upward out of sight in less than 2 seconds. the object was the size of venus the star or a little brighter it was like yellowish star. i thought it was a satellite the size of the space station but it was not. i like to star gaze and sometimes a plane will look like a bright orb because of the sun in the horizon and when they get close the light will dem and you can see the lights on the plane start blinking. also as this object got closer my neighbors horses started making sounds and my other neighbors dogs started barking. they quit about a minute after the sighting. the other odd thing was about 5 minutes after the sighting we counted around 12 planes all different some moving faster than others flying in all different directions. i normally only see around 6 commercial planes flying at one time and usually no more than 3. these planes were military because they were fly fast and some even circled. i like to sit outside and watch stars and listen to nature at night it's really peaceful. i have never seen an object do what this one did and my friends and i are still talking about it. it as made me have trouble sleeping. i started not to report this because people think you are crazy my fiancé doesn't believe us. i don't even want to tell anyone because they would just laugh. it was just the way this object shoot into the air like nothing and was gone. i know of nothing man made that could do that it went straight into space with ease and the way it floated across the sky like it was gliding there was also no sound until the dogs and horses began acting up.
content.summary: Star like object floated over house shoot straight up into space.

content.detailedDescription:
I observed a c-5a galaxy flying at about 6500 to 7000 feet below the broken cloud cover in the direction of dobbins afb. we were traveling from cartersville, ga. to rockmart, ga. via state route 113. i told my 5 year old to look at this plane as it was the largest us made aircraft that i knew of. my wife also observed the c-5a. this described plane was coming at us which would lead me to believe it could be headed back to the afb. it was flying very low and slow as often happens in this area. 

about 1-3 minutes after we observed the c-5, i saw an object much larger and faster than the c-5, flying over the broken clouds, it made a huge sweeping, and tilted,  turn from right to left in the direction of where i last saw the c-5. as it would pass over clouds it cast it's shadow on the clouds and then would be in the clear between the clouds and the shadow looked almost like the craft without cloud interference. a fuzzy dark grey colored, long cigar shaped craft with very sharp edges, front to rear. the width got larger as it tilted to negotiate the large turn, and the craft was not entirely circular as one might expect. 

the c-5 a has a wing span of 222' 9"' and a length of 247'1". the height is 65'1". this object that i saw was at least double the size if not more of the c-5a. as stated, it was flying about double the altitude than the c-5, yet was still as described, very much larger.
content.summary: Ufo flying above and in direction of c-5a galaxy.

content.detailedDescription: Bright star like that moved like a traveler. when i showed to boyfriend it suddenly  burst with speed and out of sight in about 2 seconds!
content.summary: Watched a moving star, showed to boyfriend then it shot into space in about 3 seconds and left with no signs

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from work leaving at 1:45 am driving down us arkansas hwy 59 from siloam springs ar to my home in oklahoma. about a mile outside of the little town of cincinnati arkansas i noticed a bright pulsating strobe to my se which would have been just about over cincinnati arkansas. first thought was a tower but realized i had never noticed this driving home. the light was sationary and did not move unless it was moving directly away from my line of site it was stationary. i was just coming into the town limits of cincinnati when it moved out over the highway directly in front of me about a quarter of a mile away. i watched it at tree top level until it went over a hill by a cemetery out of my line of site. the strobing light made it look like daylight each time it strobed was very intense and bright. as i drove on down the road when i topped the next hill i noticed it through the tree line due to the brightness of the light. at this point it crossed the road maybe 30 feet in front of me moving to the passenger side of my vehicle. i was coming up on a short straight part of the road so i sped up to catch it now because of it crossing the road at tree top level. i was able to get directly beside it and it was not more than 15 feet away maintaing a speed of between 55 and 60 mph with me. i have a sun roof in my car and the light was like daylight inside the vehicle every time it strobed to look directly at it i had to blink to focus back on the road. it passed in front of a hill and i was able to see it against the night sky which was partly cloudy. there was no silhouette when it strobed i could see nothing but the light. at this point i sped up and got a distance in front of it stopped turned off the vehicle and got out. it passed within 15 feet of me and there was no sound whatever only the blinking light. after it passed i got back in and followed it to within about a half a mile fo the next little town summers arkansas. where at this point i would turn west to go home. when it passed the hill about a quarter of a mile from this intersection it made a sharp right turn heading west i turned onto us ark hwy 62 headed west and stayed parralell with it until about a mile from home in oklahoma. i could see it was below the hill tops still at tree level but was not maintaining and even speed i was having to adjust both faster and slower to stay with it. i got out in front again and got to my house in i jumped out and listened. could hear no sound but could see the strobe flashing off the clouds in the sky. i moved out in the street and watched it fly over the town going west still no sound. i watched it until it was long out of sight. i was tempted to cut across on a cross road and see if i could get directly in front of it for a better look but thought maybe i didn't want to know what it actually was since it seemed to want to go in my direction the whole time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white pulsating light first observed stationary then moved along highway crossing the highway in front of me.

content.detailedDescription:
Field investigator l.F.,at mufon hq, filled out report with witness on the phone. 6/17/2015 4:16 pst
------------------------------------------------------------------------
witness thought he saw something in his security monitor, which is in black and white, he went into his back yard with a red laser and shined it on his shed.
three nights later he thought he saw something on his monitor so he carried it out side with him and saw a rod shaped object project a white beam at his shed in the back yard in the monitor. he shined his red laser at his shed and the ufo shined a white, pulsating beam at the shed also. he could only see the ufo in his black and white monitor, and although he was very near to the ufo, he could not see it, except in his monitor. he played with it for 25 minutes before it flew off over trees.
witness has the chip from the security camera for proof.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw a rod shaped object project a white beam at my shed in the back yard

i don't know how to say this but i was beat by my father i think he

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a first date with my current girlfriend emillie.  we decided to walk up the tuna canyon park trail in topanga canyon, to look out over the ocean.  we sat in one spot for 3-4 hours, watching the sunset.  the approximate coordinates are 34.059538, -118.616345 (34° 03′ 34.33″n 118° 36′ 58.84″w)

just before the sun went down, there was a cloud nw, about 10 miles off the coast of northern malibu.  it was glowing and pulsating with a deep magenta and blood orange color, undulating and changing in color, but staying constant in form.  it just looked like the sun's curved vibrations were causing a visual light illusion.

within minutes of the sun going down, i mentioned to emillie that google maps had released the underwater topography of much of the earth.  i briefly mentioned the strange underwater formation 6.6 miles off the coast of malibu, which gave the illusion of looking like an underwater base, with a flat plateau as a ceiling, and 600ft+ columns.  at the time i knew this may have been a distortion of satellite information that caused the structure to look like it has a dark interior that could be entered from beneath the ocean.

about 2 minutes after mentioning this, at approximately 7:30pm, we noticed a gigantic bright white dome floating on the ocean.  it was approximately 6-7 miles off the coast of malibu, exactly above the location of where the "base" is shown on google maps.  it wasn't necessarily a ufo, or a uso, but a "ubo" – an unidentified buoyant object.  it must have been 300-1000ft+ large.  although it appeared like a perfect white dome, it may have been a sphere half submerged in the ocean, although we could not perceive any extra light from below the surface.  within a minute and a half of staring at this motionless anomaly, it began to move west into the horizon at an alarming speed, and actually went completely into the horizon out of visible range within 20-30 seconds, at thousands of mph.
content.summary: White dome on the water approx 6 miles off the coast of malibu

content.detailedDescription: Call me. ill have more details.
content.summary: Descending bright golden or flying a strict path.

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside at 10 pm to look at venus which was extremely large and clear... then noticed blinking lights moving much faster than any planes.   watched it for over a minute, went right over our heads but was very high in the air, but could clearly see the shape of it.  it finally got too far away to see but was going in the same direction other than a couple of quick jumps left or right.
content.summary: Triangle shaped with blinking lights, travelled an appox 150 miles in less than 1 min.

content.detailedDescription: My wife was taking cool cloud pics while driving east on i-40, near holbrook az (i think), saw this quick burst of light. notice the small 'telephone pole' in one of the pics up in the light area. my wife took the pics, i was driving so she saw it much better, very quick, nothing after that. we had to keep driving.
content.summary: Taking cloud pics from car, quick burst, translucent
